name: Chris
description:
I like kissing! This is my weakness. I think that a kiss is a very intimate thing. I know when man and woman kiss each other, their souls become part of one whole and we feel how our heart begins to beat faster. In this moment we can feel totally happy person. I miss this feeling and want to invite it to my life! I am very romantic man who is ready to love and be loved. I have a lot of dreams that can come true when love will come into my life. This bright feeling can give us wings and we will fly to our happiness with these wings. Sounds great, do you agree with me? I hope to find here my soul mate and I believe that it is possible.
I am looking for my soul mate. My loved one should be honest, kind, romantic and understanding woman. I want to be happy and make you happy person too. I want to feel safe and comfortable in your arms. I want to tell you all my thoughts and feelings. I just want to know that I am yours and you are mine. I will give you all my love and passion. I want to build a very strong relationship. I hope to have a lot of things in common with you and at the same time I will be a secret for you
